key.name: target-monitor-mode
key.summary: How to choose the target monitor for new windows
key.description: Use either the monitor under the mouse cursor or the monitor of the currently focused window.

key.name: center-windows
key.summary: Center windows on the target monitor
key.description: If enabled, new windows are centered on the target monitor after placement.

key.name: debug-logging
key.description: If enabled, the extension writes detailed logs to the GNOME Shell journal.
